letters.description: Assess the client's current cognitive baselines, neurological stressors, and executive function strengths.
Stabilize the autonomic nervous system to reduce limbic interference and enhance prefrontal cortex engagement.
Apply neuro-priming techniques to increase brain-derived neurotrophic factor (BDNF) and prepare for structural change.
Execute targeted cognitive and sensory drills to stimulate specific neural pathways and increase synaptic density.
Align lifestyle factors like nutrition and sleep to support healthy neurotransmitter production and brain metabolism.
Solidify newly formed connections through repetitive behavioral loops to ensure long-term habit automaticity.
